00005 --! Standard library

00016 --                               CERN, BE/CO/HT                              --
00017 --                                                                           --
00018 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 --
00020 -- unit name: consumed_ram
00021 --
00022 --! @brief RAM that stores the Consumed variables.
00023 --!
00024 --! Used in the NanoFIP design.
00025 --! Data is written to it from the WorldFIP receiver entity wf_tx_rx. 
00026 --! Writing is controlled by the wf_engine dependent on the data type received.
00027 --! Reading is controlled by the data_if, the Wishbone interface.
00028 --!
00029 --! The module implements triple redundancy to allow to mask SEU errors.
00030 --! No 'scrubbing' of the memory (refresh with corrected data) is needed as
00031 --! the data will be rewritten every WorldFIP cycle time anyway 
00032 --! (typically 20-1000 ms).
00033 --! 
00034 --!
00035 --! @author Erik van der Bij (Erik.van.der.Bij@cern.ch)
00036 --
00037 --! @date 06/07/2009
00038 --
00039 --! @version v0.1
00040 --
00041 --! @details 
00042 --!
00043 --! <b>Dependencies:</b>\n
00044 --! wf_tx_rx
00045 --! data_if
00046 --!
00047 --! <b>References:</b>\n
00048 --! 
00049 --! 
00050 --!
00051 --! <b>Modified by:</b>\n
00052 --! Author: Erik van der Bij
00053 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 --! \n\n<b>Last changes:</b>\n
00055 --! 06/07/2009  v0.01  EB  First version \n
00056 --!
00057 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 --! @todo Define I/O signals \n
00059 --!

00066 --============================================================================
00067 entity consumed_ram is
00068 
00069 port (
00070 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071 -- Connections to wf_tx_rx (WorldFIP received data)
00072 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 
00074 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 --  Connections to wf_engine
00076 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 
00078 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 --  Connections to data_if
00080 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 
00082 
00083    du1_i     : in  std_logic; --! Strobe
00084    du2_o     : out std_logic; --! Acknowledge
00085    du3_i     : in  std_logic  --! Write enable
00086 
00087 );
00088 
00089 end entity consumed_ram;
